titles.a-list-of-uploaded-files-that-will-popul: A list of uploaded files that will populate the knowledge database, along with any progress state
titles.allow-bot-marked-users-to-have-messages-: Allow 'bot' marked users to have messages read out; default is to filter them out
titles.allow-for-private-communication-with-the: Allow for private communication with the chat bot. Currently doesn't have access to RAG.
titles.allow-only-words-in-the-goodwords-txt-fi: Allow only words in the goodwords.txt file, otherwise they will be turned into asterixis.
titles.another-social-stream-page-must-be-added: Another Social Stream page MUST be added to OBS with page permissions set to 'Read access to user information' or higher.
titles.append-replying-to-namehere-with-support: Append 'Replying to NAMEHERE:' with supported sources
titles.block-donations-memberships-from-youtube: Block donations/memberships from Youtube Shorts. Requires &shorts added to the Youtube chat pop out also.
titles.by-default-all-inbound-messages-are-save: By default all inbound messages are saved to a local database for later look-up reference
titles.by-default-the-bot-is-told-not-if-it-doe: By default the bot is told not if it doesn't see value in doing so. You can disable that instruction here though
titles.capture-likes-subs-and-other-available-e: Likes, Subs und andere verfügbare Ereignisdaten erfassen.
Capture likes, subs, and other available event data.
titles.censor-common-bad-words-with-asterixis-c: Censor common bad words with asterixis. Create badwords.txt to make your own blacklist.
Zensiere häufig vorkommende böse Wörter mit Sternchen. Erstelle badwords.txt, um eine eigene schwarze Liste zu erstellen.
titles.censor-common-bad-words-with-asterixis-i: Censor common bad words with asterixis in usernames
titles.chat-bots-can-reply-to-the-chat: Chat bots can reply to the chat
titles.clears-messages-in-the-dock-excluding-pi: Clears messages in the dock, excluding pinned messages. Hold CTRL while clicking to clear pinned messages as well.
titles.copy-youtube-video-id-to-the-clipboard: Kopiere die YouTube-Video-ID in die Zwischenablage.
titles.copy-youtube-video-id-to-the-clipboard-: Copy YouTube video ID to the clipboard.
titles.delay-capturing-messages-from-kick-to-gi: Delay capturing messages from Kick to give time for messages to be deleted if needed; 3 extra seconds of delay
titles.delay-capturing-messages-from-twitch-to-: Delay capturing messages from Twitch to give time for messages to be deleted if needed; 3 extra seconds of delay
titles.delay-capturing-messages-from-youtube-to: Delay capturing messages from Youtube to give time for messages to be deleted if needed; 3 extra seconds of delay
titles.delete-any-uploaded-bad-words-list-the-d: Delete any uploaded bad words list; the default list will be used instead.
titles.disable-the-host-chat-option-in-the-dock: Disable the host chat option in the dock and the api. Featured chat remains enabled.
titles.do-not-capture-your-responses-that-you-m: Do not capture your responses that you make to chat. They will be filtered out, so will not appear in the dock
titles.don-t-block-joined-stream-events-in-tikt: Don't block 'joined' stream events in TikTok
titles.download-the-entries-list-as-a-tsv-file: Download the entries list as a TSV file
titles.download-the-queue-list-as-a-tsv-file: Download the queue list as a TSV file
titles.edit-to-change-your-session-id-value-mus: Edit to change your session ID value. MUST BE UNIQUE
titles.enable-bttv-emotes-yt-tw-channels-global: Enable BTTV emotes - YT/TW channels + globals
titles.enable-ffz-emotes-yt-tw-channels-globals: Enable FFZ emotes - YT/TW channels + globals
titles.enable-the-llm-ai-bot-responder-: Enable the LLM AI Bot responder.
titles.enable-the-rag-mode-which-has-the-llm-bo: Enable the RAG mode, which has the LLM bot access a local database containing additional knowledge that if may reference in its responses.
titles.filter-out-duplicate-messages-as-a-resul: Filter out duplicate messages as a result of you replying to multiple chat sites. Only the first reply is captured
titles.filter-out-duplicate-messages-that-might: Filter out duplicate messages that might occur with a specific source only.
titles.filter-out-messages-that-might-be-chat-c: Filtere Nachrichten heraus, die Chat-Befehle sein könnten.
Filter out messages that might be chat commands.
titles.filter-out-third-party-relayed-messages-: Filter out third party relayed messages from capture; restream.io, beam, etc
titles.hide-icon-name-badges-if-the-proceeding-: Hide icon/name/badges if the proceeding messages are from the same user
titles.hide-the-links-for-each-page-so-it-can-t: Hide the links for each page so it can't be seen on stream.
titles.html-is-removed-from-messages-donations-: HTML wird aus Nachrichten, Spenden und Namen nur für dieses Dock entfernt.
HTML is removed from messages, donations, and names for this dock only.
titles.ideally-plain-text-or-markdown-files-sho: Ideally, plain text or markdown files should be used
titles.if-a-name-lacks-color-data-randomly-add-: Wenn ein Name keine Farbangaben enthält, füge eine zufällig hinzu.
If a name lacks color data, randomly add one. This does not cause a name to be displayed as colorful though- you need to enable that option.
titles.if-a-source-is-provided-limit-the-respon: If a source is provided, limit the response to this source. Comma-separated
titles.if-deleting-a-message-such-as-if-syncing: If deleting a message, such as if syncing with Youtube Delete, only delete the last message from that user, and not all of theirs
titles.if-less-than-10-messages-total-have-come: If less than 10 messages total have come in, skip the automated message interval
titles.if-you-enable-this-it-will-work-even-if-: If you enable this, it will work even if the extension itself is set to inactive
titles.include-chat-summaries-with-past-context: Include chat summaries with past context
titles.include-message-history-as-context-for-t: Include message history as context for the bot. Will slow things down..
titles.instead-of-top-chat-which-is-default-aut: Instead of Top Chat, which is default, auto-select Live Chat; Youtube Live chat pop out.
titles.interval-offset-in-minutes-0-to-issue-ju: Intervall-Versatz in Minuten; 0 für einmalige Ausgabe.
Interval offset in minutes; 0 to issue just once.
titles.jump-to-dockable-streaming-chat-link-opt: Gehe zu den Optionen für den andockbaren Streaming-Chat-Link.
Jump to dockable streaming chat link options.
titles.jump-to-single-message-overlay-link-opti: Gehe zu den Link-Optionen für einzelne Nachrichten-Overlays.
Jump to single message overlay link options.
titles.jump-to-the-battle-royal-link-options-: Jump to the battle royal link options.
titles.jump-to-the-chatbot-settings-and-tools-: Jump to the chatbot settings and tools.
titles.jump-to-the-color-name-option-: Jump to the color name option.
titles.jump-to-the-custom-gif-commands-options-: Jump to the custom GIF commands options.
titles.jump-to-the-emote-wall-link-options: Gehe zu den Optionen für die Emoji-Wand.
titles.jump-to-the-emote-wall-link-options-: Jump to the emote wall link options.
titles.jump-to-the-global-settings-and-tools: Gehe zu den globalen Einstellungen und Werkzeugen.
titles.jump-to-the-global-settings-and-tools-: Jump to the global settings and tools.
titles.jump-to-the-hype-meter-link-options: Gehe zu den Optionen für das Hype-Meter.
titles.jump-to-the-hype-meter-link-options-: Jump to the hype meter link options.
titles.jump-to-the-new-way-to-specify-host-bot-: Jump to the new way to specify host/bot names.
titles.jump-to-the-poll-link-options-: Jump to the poll link options.
titles.jump-to-the-ticker-link-options-: Jump to the ticker link options.
titles.jump-to-the-tip-jar-link-options-: Jump to the tip jar link options.
titles.jump-to-the-waitlist-link-options: Gehe zu den Optionen der Warteliste.
titles.jump-to-the-waitlist-link-options-: Jump to the waitlist link options.
titles.jump-to-the-wordcloud-link-options-: Jump to the wordcloud link options.
titles.just-text-is-captured-no-html-so-no-bttv: Es wird nur Text erfasst. Kein HTML, also keine BTTV-Emojis, etc.
Just text is captured. No HTML, so no BTTV emotes, etc.
titles.larger-twitch-post-images-instagram-imag: lgrößere Post-Bilder, Instagram-Bilder, Giphy-Bilder (keine Emojis) für Twitch
larger twitch post images, instagram images, giphy images (not emojis)
titles.leave-empty-to-trigger-always-the-bot-ma: Leave empty to trigger always. The bot may however still choose to not respond on its own though.
titles.links-are-make-clickable-and-will-open-a: Links are make clickable and will open a new tab if clicked
titles.links-are-removed-from-messages-and-repl: Links are removed from messages and replaced with a placeholder
titles.links-are-shortened-in-length-if-being-d: Links are shortened in length if being displayed
titles.load-a-font-family-from-google-fonts: Load a font family from Google Fonts
titles.loop-clips-continuously-or-show-images-u: Loop clips continuously or show images until at least minimum playout time is reached. Default is sub-second.
titles.mainly-useful-if-p2p-not-working: Hauptsächlich nützlich, wenn P2P nicht funktioniert
titles.mainly-useful-if-p2p-not-working-in-case: Mainly useful if P2P not working in cases where you want to send messages to a social end point via the Dock page.
titles.mainly-useful-if-p2p-not-working-it-can-: Mainly useful if P2P not working. It can also be used to send messages to the Dock via the API using channel 3/4
titles.makes-it-easier-to-see-names-on-darker-b: Makes it easier to see names on darker backgrounds.
titles.mark-a-message-as-a-memberchat-just-beca: Mark a message as a memberchat, just because they are a member, rather than just highlighted membership messages
titles.members-on-youtube-won-t-have-green-name: Members on Youtube won't have green names, for example.
titles.members-on-youtube-wont-have-green-names: Mitglieder auf Youtube haben zum Beispiel keine grünen Namen.
titles.messages-that-are-emoji-only-based-witho: Messages that are emoji-only based, without donation, membership, or content image, are ignored.
titles.note-bot-name-s-to-help-identify-them-th: Note:Bot name(s) to help identify them.The list of names should be comma separated..
titles.note-host-name-s-to-help-identify-them-t: Note:Host name(s) to help identify them.The list of names should be comma separated.This is like the previous list of names, except with its own flag/options
titles.note-mod-name-s-to-help-identify-them-th: Note:Mod name(s) to help identify them.The list of names should be comma separated.This is like the previous list of names, except with its own flag/options
titles.note-specify-privileged-admin-name-s-to-: Note:Specify privileged/admin name(s) to help identify them in chat.The list of names should be comma separated.
titles.note-vip-name-s-to-help-identify-them-th: Note:VIP name(s) to help identify them.The list of names should be comma separated.This is like the previous list of names, except with its own flag/options
titles.note-you-must-first-interact-with-the-do: Hinweis: Du musst zuerst mit der Dock-Seite interagieren, damit der Ton hörbar wird..
Note: You must first interact with the dock-page for any audio to be audible.
titles.note-you-must-first-interact-with-the-pa: Note: You must first interact with the page for any audio to be audible.
titles.notehostbot-names-to-help-identify-themt: Hinweis:Host-/Bot-Name(n) zur leichteren Identifizierung.Die Liste der Namen sollte durch Kommata getrennt sein.Der erste aufgelistete Name kann als Name des Hosts im Stream verwendet werden, wenn sein Name nicht anderweitig bekannt ist.
titles.only-approved-messages-get-thru-but-this: Only approved messages get thru, but this may slow things down and messages will get skipped.
titles.only-bot-marked-users-will-have-messages: Only 'bot' marked users will have messages read out.
titles.only-host-marked-users-will-have-message: Only 'host' marked users will have messages read out.
titles.only-member-marked-users-will-have-messa: Only 'member' marked users will have messages read out when using the TTS chat command.
titles.only-mod-marked-users-will-have-messages: Only 'mod' marked users will have messages read out.
titles.only-others-on-the-same-network-computer: Only others on the same network/computer as yours can connect to this via p2p
titles.only-privileged-marked-users-will-have-m: Only 'privileged' marked users will have messages read out.
titles.only-show-replies-from-you-if-they-are-f: Only show replies from you if they are from the selected source
titles.only-vip-marked-users-will-have-messages: Only 'vip' marked users will have messages read out.
titles.only-what-is-written-after-the-say-comma: Only what is written AFTER the !say command is read out. It's read out regardless of whether tts is turned on elsewhere or not.
titles.open-a-page-to-debug-midi-with: Open a page to debug MIDI with
titles.provide-comma-separated-values-messages-: Provide comma separated values; messages that start with the word will be blocked. eg: playlist,hello,subscribe
titles.provide-comma-separated-values-only-valu: Provide comma separated values; only values that match a username will be allowed.
titles.provide-comma-separated-values-values-th: Gebe durch Komma getrennte Werte an; Werte, die mit einem Benutzernamen übereinstimmen, werden abgelehnt.
Provide comma separated values; values that match a word in the event will be rejected. eg: joined,banned,gifted
Gebe durch Komma getrennte Werte an; Werte, die mit einem Wort im Ereignis übereinstimmen, werden abgelehnt. z.B.: joined,banned,gifted
titles.randomly-sets-the-color-for-a-name-this-: Randomly sets the color for a name. This does not cause a name to be displayed as colorful though- you need to enable that option.
titles.relay-messages-from-other-sites-to-stage: Relay messages from other sites to Stage TEN
titles.remove-links-when-sending-messages-to-ti: Remove links when sending messages to Tiktok from SocialStreamNinja
titles.remove-original-content-images-from-mess: Remove original content images from messages (stickers, twitter post images)
titles.see-documentation-on-socialstream-ninja-: See documentation on socialstream.ninja for details.
titles.see-documentation-on-socialstreamninja-f: Details finden Sie in der Dokumentation zu socialstream.ninja.
titles.select-the-default-text-to-speech-langua: Select the default text to speech language
titles.set-or-change-your-session-password: Set or change your session password
titles.sets-the-color-for-a-name-to-the-color-o: Sets the color for a name to the color of the source's branding. This does not cause a name to be displayed as colorful though- you need to enable that option.
titles.some-sites-may-wish-to-access-your-strea: Einige Websites möchten möglicherweise auf Ihre Stream-ID für benutzerdefinierte Integrationen von Drittanbietern zugreifen.
titles.specify-a-command-that-lets-a-guest-auto: Specify a command that lets a guest auto-queue a message
titles.specify-a-url-for-a-custom-beep-audio-fi: Specify a URL for a custom beep audio file
titles.specify-a-url-for-a-custom-sound-audio-f: Specify a URL for a custom sound audio file
titles.stop-new-entries-from-being-submitted: Stop new entries from being submitted
titles.the-bot-will-only-ever-respond-to-mods: The bot will only ever respond to mods
titles.the-user-can-use-dice-10-to-have-it-out-: The user can use !dice 10 to have it out of ten; by default it is out 1 to 6
titles.the-volume-has-a-max-of-1-0-100-: The volume has a max of 1.0 (100%)
titles.there-s-a-minimum-of-5-seconds-by-defaul: There's a minimum of 5-seconds by default
titles.this-is-needed-if-http-wss-commands-are-: This is needed if HTTP/WSS commands are being sent to the dock for remote control, to bypass p2p if needed, and to publish featured messages via server instead of P2P
titles.this-link-shows-a-list-of-names-represen: Dieser Link zeigt eine Liste von Benutzernamen in einer Warteliste
titles.this-link-shows-a-score-for-recent-chat-: Dieser Link zeigt eine Auswertung der letzten Chat-Aktivitäten pro Chat-Quelle
titles.this-link-shows-a-tally-of-donations-rec: This link shows a tally of donations recieved
titles.this-link-will-display-chat-messages-as-: Dieser Link zeigt Chatnachrichten als fortlaufende Liste an. Verwendung als Overlay oder als Kontrolldock.
This link will display chat messages as a streaming list. Use as an overlay or as a control dock.
titles.this-link-will-only-show-selected-messag: Dieser Link zeigt nur ausgewählte Nachrichten an, eine nach der anderen. Erfordert das Dock, um Nachrichten auszuwählen.
This link will only show selected messages, one at a time. Requires the dock to select messages.
titles.this-link-will-only-show-the-inbound-emo: Dieser Link zeigt nur die eingehenden Emojis an und lässt sie auf der gesamten Seite hüpfen.
This link will only show the inbound emotes, bouncing them around the full page.
titles.this-option-gives-you-time-to-delete-a-m: This option gives you time to delete a message with another dock that doesn't have the delay; censorship-friendly then
titles.this-requests-obs-browser-source-to-have: This requests OBS browser source to have permissions set higher, plus the dock needs to be loaded in OBS
titles.this-will-enable-the-add-sentiment-score: This will enable the 'add sentiment scores to messages' option also
titles.this-will-remove-the-local-database-of-k: This will remove the local database of knowledge and delete upload files
titles.time-to-keep-the-model-in-memory-1-unlim: Time to keep the model in memory; -1 unlimited. In minutes
titles.tip-you-can-use-myname-name1-name2-to-li: Tip: You can use &myname=name1,name2 to list names to exclude from TTS.
titles.tip-you-can-use-mynamename1name2-to-list: Tipp: Du kannst &myname=name1,name2 verwenden, um Namen aufzulisten, die von TTS ausgeschlossen werden sollen.
titles.to-use-you-must-click-on-the-page-when-i: To use, you must click on the page when it opens and select where to save the image for this to work
titles.totally-filter-out-messages-from-non-mem: Totally filter out messages from non-members
titles.treat-coin-bought-items-as-gifts-on-tikt: Treat coin-bought items as gifts on Tiktok, such as roses
titles.trigger-an-inbound-message-starting-when: Trigger an inbound message starting when there is an ad starting/stopping
titles.upload-a-custom-list-of-bad-words-text-f: Upload a custom list of bad words; text file only, one word per line.
titles.use-chroma-0000-instead-if-you-want-to-h: Use &chroma=0000 instead if you want to have a transparent background with the scroll bar still showing
titles.use-the-bot-to-moderate-messages-deletin: Use the bot to moderate messages, deleting messages that it thinks aren't fit. It will skip messages if it can't keep up.
titles.using-the-dock-is-the-recommended-way-to: Using the dock is the recommended way to auto-show messages
titles.when-saving-messages-to-disk-include-the: When saving messages to disk, include the photo URL of the user to disk also; data-blob in cases when that's all that's available.
titles.when-you-get-new-mesages-in-the-dock-the: When you get new mesages in the dock, they will be continuously saved to a file on disk; the default downloads folder of the browser/app, such as chrome://downloads. Reloading the dock page finishes the saving, closing the file and making it accessible.
titles.you-must-press-the-save-button-in-the-do: You must press the save button, in the dock menu bar, to specify where to save before it will start saving
